data.prayer: Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 3,881,500 citizens of the the state of Al Qalyubiyah.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Al Qalyubiyah, Egypt
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Over 86.87 percent of the people of Al Qalyubiyah are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!

data.section_summary: On average, 12 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Al Qalyubiyah, Egypt.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Al Qalyubiyah, Egypt that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Al Qalyubiyah, Egypt know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Arab, Palestinian people.
the state of Al Qalyubiyah has (about) 172,650 people who know Jesus, 336,979 people who know about him culturally, and 3,371,871 people who are far from Jesus.
Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Al Qalyubiyah, Egypt a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Al Qalyubiyah, Egypt.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.
